# <code>from nuon</code> for experimental

<div class='command-title'>Convert from nuon to structured data</div>

## Signature

```> from nuon```

## Flags

 * ```-h, --help```: Display this help message
## Examples

  Converts nuon formatted string to table
```shell
  > '{ a:1 }' | from nuon
```
  Converts nuon formatted string to table
```shell
  > '{ a:1, b: [1, 2] }' | from nuon
```
